long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chromate (derived from Chrome + Crate) is a Chrome extension written in pure Javascript/HTML to monitor the health of your clusters from within the browser at a glance. It provides critical information and enables you to quickly navigate to the admin interface of unhealthy clusters.
